questions.question: Who is the poet of the poem 'Try Again'?
questions.answer: W.E. Hickson

questions.question: What is the main theme of the poem 'Try Again'?
questions.answer: Perseverance

questions.question: What should one do after failure according to the poem?
questions.answer: Try again

questions.question: The poem mainly motivates us to:
questions.answer: Keep trying

questions.question: Which quality is strongly promoted in the poem?
questions.answer: Perseverance

questions.question: What does failure teach us?
questions.answer: Lessons for success

questions.question: The tone of the poem is:
questions.answer: Motivational

questions.question: Who will succeed according to the poem?
questions.answer: Those who keep trying

questions.question: What should we not do after failing?
questions.answer: Lose hope

questions.question: The poem inspires us to be:
questions.answer: Confident

questions.question: What is the message of the poem 'Try Again'?
questions.answer: The poem teaches us not to lose hope and to keep trying until we succeed.

questions.question: Why is failure important according to the poem?
questions.answer: Failure helps us learn and prepares us for success.

questions.question: How does the poem motivate students?
questions.answer: It encourages students to face difficulties bravely and try again.

questions.question: Explain the importance of perseverance.
questions.answer: Perseverance helps us overcome obstacles and achieve our goals.

questions.question: What lesson does the poem give to learners?
questions.answer: Never give up, even after repeated failures.
